scenes.title: Homepage Exploration
scenes.narration: This is the React homepage, offering an overview of React's purpose and key features. Let's explore some of the content.

shots.text: React is the library for web and native user interfaces.

scenes.title: Learning Resources
scenes.narration: The 'Learn' section provides an easy onboarding process. Let's check out some of the learning resources available.

scenes.title: API Documentation
scenes.narration: React offers comprehensive API documentation. Here, we'll explore the 'React DOM API' section.

shots.text: Find in-depth information about React DOM functions and utilities.

expectations: User is redirected to API reference page

coverage: This demo showcases the React website's homepage, learning resources, and API documentation, including navigation and search features.
assumptions: Basic website functionality is available and stable.
Users are familiar with common UI elements such as menus and buttons.
risks: Some website interactions might have unexpected behavior due to dynamic content or potential delays in loading.

segments.text: Welcome to the React website. Here, we have the main homepage with an introduction to React's capabilities. We'll start by exploring some of the content right away.
We see key features highlighted, and also notice the menu bar. It's easy to navigate and explore further. We can even switch the theme with these buttons.
Let's dive into the 'Learn' section. It offers a clear learning path, and we can quickly access resources. Hovering over the menu reveals more options. We can search for specific topics too.
The API documentation is comprehensive. It provides detailed insights into React's capabilities. We can easily switch between light and dark mode for comfort.
